testsuite.name: as a user I want to be able to subtract two integer numbers

testcase.name: subtraction of two single digit natural numbers with positive result
subtraction of two single digit natural numbers with negative result
subtraction of a positive and a negative integer
testcase.system-err: null com.appdebug.steps.serenity.UserFlow.shouldSeeResult(UserFlow.java:44) com.appdebug.steps.UserSteps.the_user_should_see_as_result_the_value(UserSteps.java:47) ✽.Then the user should see as result the value '3'(arithmetic operations/subtraction.feature:19)

testcase.name: subtraction of two negative numbers
